ingredients.ingredient: ½ (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste

cookingTips: Mash avocado to desired consistency while maintaining some texture; aim for chunky rather than smooth
Add lime juice immediately to preserve avocado color and prevent oxidation
Mix in black beans gently to maintain texture contrast between creamy avocado and firm beans
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you keep avocado from browning while achieving the right texture balance with black beans, and what flavor bridges both ingredients?
